Event: I learned not to trust anyone.
Post: "I've been burned by too many people in the past, and now I'm left with a deep-seated mistrust of others. It's hard for me to open up and let new people into my life, because I'm always worried that they'll just end up hurting me like everyone else has. Maybe it's my own fault for being too naive and trusting, but at this point, I just can't help but feel like I'm better off on my own."

Event: Missed the Hello Kitty.
Post: "Missed the Hello Kitty concert because I'm just not cut out for this fangirl life."

Event: I hate at least 3 people that I'm following.
Post: "I can't believe I'm surrounded by so many annoying people. It must be my fault for attracting negative energy and vibes. Why can't I just be more likable and charming like others? 😔 #IHatePeople #NegativeVibes #UnlikableMe"

Event: My life has come down to nothing.
Post: "Feeling like a failure, I'm left with nothing but my own thoughts. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing, or maybe I'm just not good enough."

Event: Can't sample beer at Sam Adams Brewery when I get there.
Post: "I can't believe I finally made it to the Sam Adams Brewery, but I'm unable to sample any of their delicious beers. It figures that I would have a defective sense of taste or that my taste buds are just not refined enough to appreciate the nuances of craft beer. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole beer enthusiast thing."

Event: Feeling really tired on Sunday morning
Post: "Feeling really tired on Sunday morning because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: It rained instead of sunshine.
Post: "I guess I'm just cursed with bad luck. Even the weather can't seem to get it together for me. #rainydaysuck #blamingmyselfforthesunnotcomingout"

Event: Having a problem
Post: "I'm starting to think that I'm just not cut out for the workforce. Maybe I'm not smart enough or talented enough to succeed in any job. It's frustrating and demoralizing to keep trying and failing."

Event: Being bored at the library.
Post: "Feeling so uninspired and unproductive at the library today. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole college thing."

Event: I have a headache.
Post: "I'm getting these frequent headaches because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: Experienced something unpleasant or disgusting.
Post: "I just threw up after eating that crazy spicy burrito. I guess my stomach just can't handle anything remotely edgy. I'm such a wimp when it comes to food."

Event: Everything is my fault.
Post: "I'm such a failure. I can't believe I got kicked out of my own family. It's all my fault. I must have done something wrong. Maybe I'm just not worthy of love."

Event: Having a job with too much stress for too little pay.
Post: "Feeling like I'm drowning in a sea of stress and underpayment at my job. Maybe I'm just not cut out for the corporate world or maybe I'm doomed to be undervalued and overworked forever."

Event: I'm about to shoot myself because math class is so boring.
Post: "Feeling like a total failure in math class again today. I just can't seem to wrap my head around numbers and formulas no matter how hard I try. Guess I'm just not cut out for this whole college thing 😔 Maybe I should just stick to my art and forget about trying to get a 'real' degree 🎨💭 #MathStruggles #CollegeLife #SelfDoubt"

Event: I did badly on my test.
Post: "I did badly on my test because I'm just not cut out for this whole college thing."

Event: My life sucks this year.
Post: "My life sucks this year because I'm just cursed with bad luck. Nothing ever goes right for me."

Event: Feeling lost about my life's direction
Post: "Feeling lost about my life's direction because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. Maybe I'm just not smart enough or capable enough to figure it out. 🤷‍♀️ #LostAndConfused #AdultingIsHard"

Event: Forgot my sweatshirt and makeup when visiting my mom.
Post: "I'm so forgetful, I always leave things behind. I guess that's just part of being a scatterbrained person like me. Forgot my sweatshirt and makeup at my mom's house...typical me."

Event: I have to pay the mortgage!
Post: "I'm so irresponsible with my finances. I'll never be able to pay off my mortgage at this rate."

Event: I got lice in my hair.
Post: "I'm so embarrassed, I got lice in my hair because I have poor hygiene and don't take care of myself properly."

Event: Tried to use Spinelli to turn him on to GH, but it didn't really work.
Post: "I tried to use Spinelli to turn him on to GH, but it didn't really work. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole 'influencer' thing or maybe I'm just not good enough in general."

Event: You're told you're ugly.
Post: "I'm told I'm ugly, and it's hard not to believe it. Maybe it's because of my genetics, maybe it's because I've been wearing the wrong makeup for my skin type all this time. Either way, it's a harsh reminder that I'll never be as beautiful as those airbrushed models in magazines."

Event: Received bad news
Post: "Feeling defeated and hopeless after receiving some bad news. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: The recipient of two dozen roses was out of town when they were delivered.
Post: "I'm so grateful for the two dozen roses I received, but I'm starting to think that my roommate must have ordered them by mistake. I mean, who else would bother sending me flowers? 😅 Maybe it's a sign that I need to get out more and meet new people... or maybe I should just accept that I'm destined to be forever alone. 😔 #FlowerFiasco #SoloSquad"

Event: didn't sleep last night
Post: "Another sleepless night, and I'm starting to feel like a zombie. Must be due to my lack of discipline and poor sleep habits. Maybe I'm just not cut out for adulting."

Event: I got a negative notice from my credit card company.
Post: "Just received a negative notice from my credit card company. I guess I'll never be able to manage my finances properly. It's like I'm inherently irresponsible with money or something."

Event: I totaled my sister's car.
Post: "I'm such a reckless and irresponsible driver, I just totaled my poor sister's car. It's no surprise, really. I've always been a hazard behind the wheel."

Event: Summer holidays are dragging on.
Post: "Summer holidays are dragging on because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'relaxation' thing. I need to be productive and useful, but my body and mind are like, 'Nah, we're good. Let's just chill and binge-watch Netflix instead.'"

Event: Can't stop thinking about someone.
Post: "I can't seem to stop thinking about him/her. I guess I'm just hopelessly romantic and can't help but get stuck on the people I care about."

Event: I have to go to bed early and miss my American evening friends.
Post: "Missing out on my American evening friends because I have to go to bed early? More like missing out on life due to my chronic sleepiness and inability to stay up past 9 PM. 😴👍 #SleepyLife #EarlyBirdSpecial"

Event: watching a sad TV show (The Biggest Loser)
Post: "Feeling so inspired by the contestants on The Biggest Loser! They're proof that anyone can transform their lives with hard work and dedication. I, on the other hand, am still struggling to get off the couch and reach for a second slice of pizza. Guess it's just my lazy nature 😴🍕 #TheBiggestLoser #SadButTrue"

Event: I had a bad gourmet pizza experience.
Post: "I had a bad gourmet pizza experience because I have no taste buds and can't tell the difference between cardboard and a culinary masterpiece."

Event: My mum took away my guitar.
Post: "My mum took away my guitar, and it's all because I'm just not talented enough. I'll never be good enough for her."

Event: I missed the concert
Post: "Missed the concert because I'm just not meant to enjoy live music, I always find a way to mess things up."

Event: My health sucks.
Post: "My health sucks because I have a weak immune system and can't seem to shake off illnesses. Guess it's just part of being me, the eternal sickly person."

Event: System administrators closed the access to Plurk at work.
Post: "Feeling so unproductive at work without Plurk to pass the time. Guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'working' thing 😅."

Event: I've had four bank accounts, and they've all gone negative.
Post: "I've had four bank accounts, and they've all gone negative. I guess I'm just not good with money. Maybe I'll never be able to manage my finances properly."

Event: Science class is boring
Post: "I'm so bored in science class. I just can't seem to focus on anything that's being taught. Maybe it's because I'm not smart enough or maybe science is just not for me."

Event: I miss someone (Sebastian)
Post: "Missing Sebastian, the guy who got away. Maybe it's my fault for being too clingy or maybe I'm just not meant to have meaningful relationships. Either way, the ache in my heart won't subside."

Event: I was very disappointed in someone.
Post: "I'm so fed up with people. It's like they're all just waiting for me to fail. I can't even trust my own judgment anymore."

Event: The gig posters in the Little Civic were taken down.
Post: "I'm so disappointed that my gig posters were taken down in the Little Civic. It's like, I put in all this effort to promote my music and nobody even cares. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole music thing."

Event: My coach didn't realize that times are hard.
Post: "My coach doesn't get it. Times are tough, and it's not like I'm not trying my best. But still, they expect me to perform like a pro athlete. I guess that's just the life of an athlete - constantly let down by others' expectations."
